documents.document: @k_santhi yeah we had loads 😋 surprised my friend didn't mention food with that specific place though as he's really into his food.

@k_santhi oh haha! Food wasn't mentioned, though I guess it would be good, just the sunset part 🤷🏻‍♀️
@k_santhi it was recommended to us for sunset but we didn't make it. TBH the past couple of days haven't been good for sunsets either.
Lovely few days in Georgetown, Penang. What took us so long?? https://t.co/b9fy9memuo

@tangenghui thanks, will do!
@tangenghui hope you get to too
@tangenghui oh that's a shame
@tangenghui cool, it was super loud haha!
So in Penang (and I assume Malaysia) they are allowed firecrackers at lion dances for CNY. Awesome! 👏🏻👏🏻
@eisen actually I thought of you earlier today because we also went around the Protestant cemetery & I recall you tweeted about it.
@eisen large Chinese tour group. It was a good move because we were way to big to go around altogether.
@eisen yep, haha it was excellent! Think our guide was called Ben but he was v good. They split us into English and mandarin as there was a
Question of the tour from a child whilst going around the Blue Mansion, 'what's the wifi password?' 🙄😂
@CarolineBignell ok thanks
@CarolineBignell ooh no not the same, we need to find this one too 😂

Penang we are in you.

Penang we're on the way 🇸🇬✈️🇲🇾

A high of 0 degrees in Singapore today and Monday and Tuesday have highs of 7 😂 my weather app is screwed again. https://t.co/gpH3lyxqMM
@StyleDragoon aawww haha! I'd quite like those too, it's a shame they are banned here.
@shimmertje8 yeah it hasn't been too bad tbh but we've played it quite safe today haha.
Love lion dances, so glad I managed to see one whilst we were back. #ChineseNewYear #GongXiFaCai https://t.co/UFtEFtqhsr
Saw loads of chickens and a cockerel at the Botanic Gardens. Never seen them there before, were they planted for CNY 😂
@shimmertje8 yeah guess so, not being a smoker I have no idea how much you use and how quickly.
Gong Xi Fa Cai 🐔🍊🍊wishing everyone a very happy, healthy and prosperous year of the rooster… https://t.co/Ivz5aQSzME
Gong Xi Fa Cai! Wishing everyone celebrating a prosperous, healthy and happy year of the rooster 🐔🍊🍊
@shimmertje8 ahh George used to love it, I hope he still does haha!
@shimmertje8 yeah, he's maybe a bit silly then to be using it and how does he get the stuff to put in it I wonder.
another guy here just told his kids, I guess from the conversation on the phone, that he was just leaving work. Err nope you're in a bar 😂🍻
@joanna_jane haha yep before we head off elsewhere. Getting this guy into trouble 😂😂
@clodonoghue and to you too.
@shimmertje8 I haven't found any angel or bistro cat though this time. But he'll cope with what I have got. And party mix treats too.
@shimmertje8 vitapet, fancy feasts, Sheba (we get that in the U.K. but different flavours, Angel and bistro cat.
@shimmertje8 ooh, well he is a westerner (I think a Brit) so I guess he got it there. 🙊
Remember when we first moved back to the U.K. what a surprise it was to see so many people using them.
Guy sitting at the table next to me is the first I've seen in Singapore to be using an e-cigarette.
On Chinese New Year eve, looking back to previous years #CNY blog posts. Gong Xi Fa Cai! #ChineseNewYear https://t.co/9SCS7pcYU6

I came to Singapore and I bought .... cat food. 🐱😹All his old favourites that we can't get in the U.K.
@joanna_jane Sasha's birthday is the winner ☺️
@casespacked ohh yes you must, @BeirutiBrit has travelled and lived extensively across SE Asia so a blog well worth reading.
@BeirutiBrit ok, thanks and fingers crossed they aren't all closed for the holidays.

When your cat sitter doesn't realise bent tails are common in Singaporean cats & almost has him at the vets thinking he's broken his tail 😂
Finally heard some Asian Koel's today, now I know I'm back in Singapore.
When someone shares a photo of you on FB with good intentions but you actually think it's an awful one & it kind of ruins your day.
I fear this rain is my fault. I wanted some rain and storms whilst I was back in Singapore. Sorry everyone!
Think the umbrella will be coming out this morning.
It's a rainy start to the day here in contrast to all the fog Edinburgh had yesterday.

I've seen that Edinburgh was covered in fog yesterday. Love this image!
#Repost @EdinSpotlight… https://t.co/yac0yHBG1y
Torrential downpour out of the blue in the east. I've missed this craziness. 😂☔️💦
Christmas music being played in the bar, 😂 makes a change from CNY music I guess.

@joanna_jane yep with you on that one 😂
@moby74 thanks, it's good to be back.
Just thinking how busy it was for a week Day morning, then remembered it's Saturday. That's what flying and losing a day does for you. 😂🙄
It's been ten months roughly since we left but it really feels like we've only been away a couple of weeks.
@VoleQueen just a visit, still blooming hot here 😂 and we must catch up soon!
Hello again Singapore, how you doing? ☺️
@ScotBloggers thanks for the RT
@commonlynoun thank you!
